code: import React,{useState}from"react";import axios from"axios";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{BASE_URL}from"../utils";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AddNote=()=>{const[judul,setJudul]=useState("");const[isi,setIsi]=useState("");const navigate=useNavigate();const saveNote=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{await axios.post(`${BASE_URL}/notes`,{judul,isi});navigate("/");}catch(error){console.log(error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container mt-5 has-text-centered",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"title is-2",children:" Add Notes"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"columns is-centered",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"column is-one-third",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"box p-5",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:saveNote,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"field",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{className:"label",children:"Judul"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"control",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",className:"input has-text-centered has-background-light has-border-dark has-text-black",value:judul,onChange:e=>setJudul(e.target.value),placeholder:"Judul"})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"field",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{className:"label",children:"Isi"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"control",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",className:"input has-text-centered has-background-light has-border-dark has-text-black",value:isi,onChange:e=>setIsi(e.target.value),placeholder:"Isi"})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"field",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"button is-success is-fullwidth",children:"Add"})})]})})})})]});};export default AddNote;
